member.name: D3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Specifies the subresources from a resource that are accessible using an unordered-access view.

member.name: D3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.ViewDimension
member.summary: The resource type (see ), which specifies how the resource will be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Buffer
member.summary: Specifies which buffer elements can be accessed (see ).

member.name: D3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture1D
member.summary: Specifies the subresources in a 1D texture that can be accessed (see ).

member.name: D3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture1DArray
member.summary: Specifies the subresources in a 1D texture array that can be accessed (see ).

member.name: D3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture2D
member.summary: Specifies the subresources in a 2D texture that can be accessed (see ).

member.name: D3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture2DArray
member.summary: Specifies the subresources in a 2D texture array that can be accessed (see ).

member.name: D3D11_UNORDERED_ACCESS_VIEW_DESC.Texture3D
member.summary: Specifies subresources in a 3D texture that can be accessed (see ).
